item.title: Neumann U87 Large-Diaphragm Condenser Microphone
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Studio standard. Unrivaled clarity. The Neumann U87 microphone is a legend in the recording industry, renowned for its pristine sound quality and versatility.
item.content:encoded:
Introducing the Neumann U87 Large-Diaphragm Condenser Microphone – the epitome of audio excellence! Renowned for its pristine sound quality and unmatched versatility, the U87 is a must-have for any serious audio professional. Whether you’re recording vocals, instruments, or podcasts, this microphone delivers unparalleled clarity and warmth, capturing every nuance with precision and finesse. Its legendary design and robust build ensure reliability in any recording environment, from the comfort of your home studio to the grandeur of a professional recording facility. Elevate your sound to the next level with the Neumann U87 – where quality meets perfection.

  • Pressure gradient receiver
  • Polar pattern: omnidirectional, cardioid, figure-of-eight
  • Switchable 10 dB attenuation
  • Nominal impedance 200 Ohm
  • Frequency response 20 – 20,000 Hz
  • Sound pressure level for k < 0.5%: 117 dB (cardioid)
  • Sound pressure level for k < 0.5% with pre-attenuation: 127 dB
  • 48 V phantom powering required
  • Dimensions (diameter x length): 56 x 200 mm
  • Weight: 500 g
  • Colour: Nickel
  • Suitable elastic suspension: art. 125520 (not included)
  • Suitable tripod mount: art. 218556 (not included)

item.title: Sennheiser HD 650 Open-Back Headphones
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Audiophile quality. Supreme comfort. The Sennheiser HD 650 headphones deliver pristine sound and luxurious comfort, perfect for critical listening and long studio sessions.
item.content:encoded: Immerse yourself in a world of pure audio bliss with the Sennheiser HD 650 Open-Back Headphones. Renowned for their exceptional sound quality and comfort, these headphones are a favorite among audiophiles and music professionals alike. The open-back design provides a natural soundstage and spacious stereo imaging, allowing you to hear every detail of your music with stunning clarity and precision. The lightweight aluminum voice coils and neodymium magnets deliver smooth, extended frequency response with deep, tight bass and sparkling highs. With their velour earpads and padded headband, the HD 650 headphones offer hours of listening comfort, making them ideal for critical listening sessions, mixing, mastering, and casual listening alike.

item.title: Audio-Technica ATH-M50x Closed-Back Headphones
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Professional-grade closed-back headphones for studio and live monitoring.
item.content:encoded:
The Audio-Technica ATH-M50x headphones are renowned for their exceptional audio quality and durability. Designed for professional monitoring and mixing applications, these closed-back headphones feature large-aperture drivers, robust construction, and a circumaural design for excellent sound isolation. With their accurate sound reproduction and comfortable fit, the ATH-M50x headphones are a favorite among audio engineers, musicians, and audiophiles alike.

  • Closed
  • Circumaural
  • Dynamic
  • 45 mm driver with neodymium magnet system and CCAW voice coils
  • 90-Degree swivelling earcups
  • Earpads made of faux leather
  • Frequency range: 15 – 28000 Hz
  • Maximum input power: 1600 mW at 1 kHz
  • Impedance: 38 Ohm
  • Peak SPL: 99 dB
  • Detachable cable
  • 1.2 m coiled cable
  • 1.2 m and 3 m straight cables
  • Weight with cable: 341 g
  • Weight without cable: 287 g
  • Colour: Black
  • Includes 6.3 mm adaptor and bag

item.title: Shure SM7B Dynamic Microphone
item.dc:creator: Jose Caceres
item.description: Studio standard. Exceptional clarity. The Shure SM7B dynamic microphone is a favorite in recording studios for its smooth, natural sound and versatile application.
item.content:encoded:
Experience the legendary sound and performance of the Shure SM7B Dynamic Microphone. Trusted by professionals in the recording industry for decades, this iconic microphone delivers smooth, natural sound reproduction with exceptional clarity and detail. The SM7B features a cardioid polar pattern, which provides excellent off-axis rejection and minimizes background noise, making it ideal for capturing vocals and instruments in any recording environment. The built-in air suspension shock isolation system eliminates mechanical noise and vibration, ensuring clean and clear recordings every time. With its rugged construction, versatile performance, and timeless design, the Shure SM7B is the microphone of choice for broadcasters, podcasters, musicians, and sound engineers around the world.

  • Polar pattern: Cardioid
  • Frequency range: 50 – 20,000 Hz
  • Sensitivity -59.0 dB (1.12 mV)
  • Bass roll-off switch
  • Mid-boost switch
  • Impedance: 150 ohms
  • Shielding against electromagnetic interference
  • Swivel mount
  • XLR connector
  • Dimensions: 190 x 64 x 96 mm
  • Weight: 766 g
  • Includes switch cover plate and windscreen
  • Suitable foam windscreen
  • Suitable replacement pop-up windscreen

item.title: Shure SM58 Dynamic Vocal Microphone
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Legendary durability. Crystal-clear sound. The Shure SM58 dynamic microphone is a favorite among performers worldwide for its rugged construction and smooth vocal reproduction.
item.content:encoded:
For over five decades, the Shure SM58 Dynamic Vocal Microphone has been the go-to choice for performers and sound engineers worldwide. Renowned for its rugged construction, clear sound, and reliable performance, the SM58 is a true industry standard. Featuring a cardioid polar pattern, the SM58 provides excellent off-axis rejection, minimizing feedback and unwanted noise. The tailored frequency response accentuates vocals while attenuating low-frequency rumble and handling noise, ensuring crystal-clear sound reproduction in any live or studio environment. With its legendary durability and time-tested reliability, the Shure SM58 is the microphone of choice for vocalists, presenters, and musicians of all genres.

  • Optimised frequency response with brightened mids and bass cuts
  • Integrated, effective wind and pop filter
  • Shock absorber system
  • Robust construction, sturdy steel mesh grille
  • Directivity: Cardioid
  • Frequency range: 50 – 15,000 Hz
  • Output impedance: 300 Ohm
  • Sensitivity: -56 dBV / Pa (1.85 mV)
  • Dimensions: 23 x 162 x 51 mm
  • Weight: 298 g
  • Includes microphone bag, microphone clamp and 3/8″ reducing thread
  • Suitable windshield: Article no. 135783, suitable replacement mesh grille: Article no. 183069 (both not included)

item.title: AKG K240 Studio Headphones
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Precision monitoring. Comfortable fit. The AKG K240 studio headphones provide accurate sound reproduction and long-wearing comfort, essential for professional audio production.
item.content:encoded:
Immerse yourself in pristine sound quality with the AKG K240 Studio Headphones. Designed for professional monitoring and mixing applications, these semi-open headphones deliver accurate sound reproduction and extended frequency response. The patented Varimotion diaphragm technology ensures crisp highs, detailed midrange, and deep bass, allowing you to hear every nuance of your music with exceptional clarity. The self-adjusting headband and velour earpads provide long-lasting comfort, making them ideal for extended listening sessions in the studio. Whether you’re tracking, mixing, or simply enjoying your favorite music, the AKG K240 Studio Headphones deliver the accuracy and comfort you need to achieve professional results.

  • Circumaural
  • Semi-open
  • Dynamic
  • New XXL capsule
  • Impedance: 55 Ohm
  • Frequency response: 15 – 25,000 Hz
  • Sensitivity: 104 dB/V
  • Distortion factor < 0.3
  • Rated power: 200 mW
  • Automatic headband adjustment for perfect fit
  • Cable routing on one side for easy handling
  • Detachable cable with mini-XLR plug
  • Cable length: 3m
  • Gold-plated 3.5 mm stereo jack plug
  • Weight with cable: 284 g
  • Weight without cable: 229 g
  • Includes 6.3 mm jack adapter
